name: v1.5
body:
## What's Changed
* Support Ubuntu 24.04 out of the box (fixes #261)â€¦ while keeping support for more recent Protobuf intact by @hartwork in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/263
* Resolve needless check for CMake <3.10.0 by @hartwork in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/265
* Speed up build of bundled Protobuf via `-Dprotobuf_BUILD_LIBUPB=OFF` by @hartwork in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/266
* Support `-DLIB_PROTO_MUTATOR_EXAMPLES:BOOL=OFF` to build without examples by @hartwork in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/264
* Make `ExternalProject_Add` pass `--depth 1` to `git clone` to reduce cloning time by @hartwork in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/268
* Fix typo "usefull" two times by @hartwork in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/271
* Add support for Ubuntu 22.04 LTS by @hartwork in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/270
* Enable CI for non-master branches by @hartwork in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/272
* Pin external libexpat and libxml2 for CI stability by @hartwork in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/273
* Add support for Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (where OSS-Fuzz is at) by @hartwork in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/274
* Use `std::move` in two more places? by @hartwork in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/275
* Fix minimum CMake version for `-DLIB_PROTO_MUTATOR_TESTING=ON` by @hartwork in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/276
* Compile disabled test if we can by @vitalybuka in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/277
* Move GOOGLE_PROTOBUF_VERSION in port/ by @vitalybuka in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/278
* Improve upon pull request #278 by @hartwork in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/280


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/compare/v1.4...v1.5

name: v1.4
body:
## What's Changed
* Keep C++ standard flexible by @uilianries in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/248
* Switch from DownCastToGenerated to DownCastMessage by @vitalybuka in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/250
* Include header fixes. by @atetubou in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/253
* Fix doc comment about removed seed parameter by @chfast in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/254
* Fix CI (fixes #259) by @hartwork in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/260
* Run CI every week (to make breakage apparent with less delay) by @hartwork in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/258
* Move troublesome default `-Werror` from CMake to CI (fixes #255) by @hartwork in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/257
* Fix default PKG_CONFIG_PATH in CMakeLists.txt by @nertpinx in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/251
* Avoid direct dependency on absl. by @vitalybuka in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/262

## New Contributors
* @uilianries made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/248
* @atetubou made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/253
* @chfast made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/254
* @hartwork made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/260
* @nertpinx made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/251

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/compare/v1.3...v1.4

name: v1.3
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README by @ligurio in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/230
* Replace DebugString with absl::StrCat by @vitalybuka in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/243
* Unpoison results from LLVMFuzzerMutate. by @Allen-Webb in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/213
* Clang format #213 by @vitalybuka in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/244

## New Contributors
* @ligurio made their first contribution in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/230

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/compare/v1.2...v1.3

name: v1.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Upgrade  protobuf to v22.3 by @vitalybuka in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/219
* Switch to c++14 by @vitalybuka in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/220
* master by @vitalybuka in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/239
* Use DownCastToGenerated by @vitalybuka in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/240
* Setup github actions to build and test by @vitalybuka in https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/pull/241


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/google/libprotobuf-mutator/compare/v1.1...v1.2
